p.k: Ryan Keely has invited her college friend Katie Morgan over to visit. While Ryan currently has her own boyfriend (Alex Legend), she still has eyes for Katie as well, and the two hot MILFs fuck each other. They swear to keep it a secret from Alex, but things don't work out so simply. When Alex catches them getting some shut eye in the same bed, he decides to get in on the fun by fondling Katie (who's actually awake the whole time). Katie and Alex then fuck until they're caught by Ryan! Drama is avoided when all three decide that sharing is caring, and a threesome ensues!
